publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-839 Pauline McNeill: Museums and Galleries Month 2000-That the Parliament welcomes the Museums and Galleries Month 2000 launched on Monday 1 May in Glasgow's Gallery of Modern Art, the aim of the initiative being to raise the public profile of museums and galleries.
S1M-839 Museums and Galleries Month 2000 (lodged on 10 May 2000) Margaret Jamieson*

S1M-839 Pauline McNeill: Museums and Galleries Month 2000-That the Parliament welcomes the Museums and Galleries Month 2000 launched on Monday 1 May in Glasgow's Gallery of Modern Art, the aim of the initiative being to raise the public profile of museums and galleries. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson
S1M-839 Museums and Galleries Month 2000 (lodged on 10 May 2000) Karen Gillon*
S1M-839 Museums and Galleries Month 2000 (lodged on 10 May 2000) Michael Russell*, Kate Maclean*
S1M-839 Museums and Galleries Month 2000 (lodged on 10 May 2000) Cathy Peattie*, Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-839 Pauline McNeill: Museums and Galleries Month 2000—That the Parliament welcomes the Museums and Galleries Month 2000 launched on Monday 1 May in Glasgow’s Gallery of Modern Art, the aim of the initiative being to raise the public profile of museums and galleries. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Karen Gillon, Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Cathy Peattie, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-839 Museums and Galleries Month 2000 (lodged on 10 May 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-839 Museums and Galleries Month 2000 (lodged on 10 May 2000) Dr Richard Simpson*, Tavish Scott*
S1M-839 Museums and Galleries Month 2000 (lodged on 10 May 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-839 Pauline McNeill: Museums and Galleries Month 2000—That the Parliament welcomes the Museums and Galleries Month 2000 launched on Monday 1 May in Glasgow’s Gallery of Modern Art, the aim of the initiative being to raise the public profile of museums and galleries. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Karen Gillon, Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Cathy Peattie, Nora Radcliffe, Andrew Wilson, Dr Richard Simpson, Tavish Scott, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-839 Museums and Galleries Month 2000 (lodged on 10 May 2000) Mr Michael McMahon*

S1M-839 Pauline McNeill: Museums and Galleries Month 2000-That the Parliament welcomes the Museums and Galleries Month 2000 launched on Monday 1 May in Glasgow's Gallery of Modern Art, the aim of the initiative being to raise the public profile of museums and galleries. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Karen Gillon, Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Cathy Peattie, Nora Radcliffe, Andrew Wilson, Dr Richard Simpson, Tavish Scott, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Michael McMahon

S1M-839 Pauline McNeill: Museums and Galleries Month 2000-That the Parliament welcomes the Museums and Galleries Month 2000 launched on Monday 1 May in Glasgow's Gallery of Modern Art, the aim of the initiative being to raise the public profile of museums and galleries. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Karen Gillon, Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Cathy Peattie, Nora Radcliffe, Andrew Wilson, Dr Richard Simpson, Tavish Scott, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Michael McMahon
S1M-839 Museums and Galleries Month 2000 (lodged on 10 May 2000) Dr Sylvia Jackson*

S1M-839 Pauline McNeill: Museums and Galleries Month 2000—That the Parliament welcomes the Museums and Galleries Month 2000 launched on Monday 1 May in Glasgow’s Gallery of Modern Art, the aim of the initiative being to raise the public profile of museums and galleries. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Karen Gillon, Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Cathy Peattie, Nora Radcliffe, Andrew Wilson, Dr Richard Simpson, Tavish Scott, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Michael McMahon, Dr Sylvia Jackson

S1M-839 Pauline McNeill: Museums and Galleries Month 2000—That the Parliament welcomes the Museums and Galleries Month 2000 launched on Monday 1 May in Glasgow’s Gallery of Modern Art, the aim of the initiative being to raise the public profile of museums and galleries. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Karen Gillon, Michael Russell, Kate Maclean, Cathy Peattie, Nora Radcliffe, Andrew Wilson, Dr Richard Simpson, Tavish Scott, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Michael McMahon, Dr Sylvia Jackson
